artist: Katsushika Hokusai; Poem by Sōkaen Takemaru
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill Jr.
marks: 草花園嶽丸　床にさく梅はかぶとの鉢うゑにかざる鎧の袖もかをれり Sōkaen Takemaru: . Hokusai aratame Iitsu hitsu 北斎改為一筆
medium: Woodblock print (surimono); ink and color on paper
title: Avalokitesvara Sutra and Armor with Chrysanthemum-Stream Motif in Mandarin Orange
